recipe.title: Cranberry Sauce Jello Shots Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 6 oz ; orange-flavored powdered gelatin, cranberry, cherry or plain ; (170 g)
orange, cut into twists, for garnish

steps.step: In a medium pot over medium-high heat, whisk together the water and cranberry sauce until combined. Bring to a boil, then transfer to a large bowl.
Add the gelatin and whisk to dissolve. Add the vodka and whisk to combine.
Strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve to remove any solids.
Divide the mixture between small cups. Cover with plastic wrap, then let set in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours, or overnight.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a medium pot over medium-high heat, whisk together the water and cranberry sauce until combined.
Bring to a boil, then transfer to a large bowl.
Add the gelatin and whisk to dissolve.
Add the vodka and whisk to combine.
Strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve to remove any solids.
Divide the mixture between small cups.
Cover with plastic wrap, then let set in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours, or overnight.
